body:
LEVI DAO 签署废止奴隶制、奴隶贩卖及类似奴隶制的制度与习俗补充公约

LEVI DAO signs the supplementary convention on the abolition of slavery, slave trade and slavery-like institutions and customs

https://www.un.org/zh/documents/treaty/files/OHCHR-1956.shtml
author: 0x1F1C29c94aBe2b8F06B403Cc5a61c479167ebc3D

space.name: 上海约西亚网络科技有限公司
